item.title: Amanda add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "We used to build civilizations. Now we build shopping malls." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Scott Turow
item.description: "I am a law student in my first year at the law, and there are many moments when I am simply a mess." -- Scott Turow

item.title: Amanda add a quote by David Plouffe
item.description: "It looks like they picked Sarah goddamn Palin. We have to get moving." -- David Plouffe

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Charlotte Bronte
item.description: "I have for the first time found what I can truly love–I have found you. You are my sympathy–my better self–my good angel–I am bound to you with a strong attachment. I think you good, gifted, lovely: a fervent, a solemn passion is conceived in my heart; it leans to you, draws you to my centre and spring of life, wrap my existence about you–and, kindling in pure, powerful flame, fuses you and me in one." -- Charlotte Bronte
